# train(trainingData:parameters:sessionParameters:)

**Type Method**

Begins an asynchronous style transfer model-training session.

## Declaration

```swift
static func train(trainingData: MLStyleTransfer.DataSource, parameters: MLStyleTransfer.ModelParameters = .init(), sessionParameters: MLTrainingSessionParameters = .init()) throws -> MLJob<MLStyleTransfer>
```

## Parameters

- **trainingData**: The style image and content images represented by a data source.
- **parameters**: An [doc://com.apple.createml/documentation/CreateML/MLStyleTransfer/ModelParameters] instance you use to configure the model for the training session.
- **sessionParameters**: An [doc://com.apple.createml/documentation/CreateML/MLTrainingSessionParameters] instance you use to configure the training session.

## Return Value

An [doc://com.apple.createml/documentation/CreateML/MLJob] that represents the style transfer model-training session.

## Training a style transfer model asynchronously

- **makeTrainingSession(trainingData:parameters:sessionParameters:)**: Creates an asynchronous training session for a style transfer model.
- **resume(_:)**: Begins or continues an asynchronous style transfer model-training session.
- **restoreTrainingSession(sessionParameters:)**: Creates an asynchronous training session for a style transfer model by restoring an existing training session’s state from its parameters.
